title: 服务端经常崩溃，出现报错
author: 南少D凌坤
txt_content:
RT，报错如下

19.08 17:46:06 [服务器] ERROR sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.parseHTTP(HttpClient.java:675)19.08 17:46:06 [服务器] ERROR sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.parseHTTP(HttpClient.java:647)19.08 17:46:06 [服务器] ERROR sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.parseHTTPHeader(HttpClient.java:704)19.08 17:46:06 [服务器] ERROR java.io.BufferedInputStream.read(BufferedInputStream.java:345)19.08 17:46:06 [服务器] ERROR java.io.BufferedInputStream.read1(BufferedInputStream.java:286)19.08 17:46:06 [服务器] ERROR java.io.BufferedInputStream.fill(BufferedInputStream.java:246)19.08 17:46:06 [服务器] ERROR java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:141)19.08 17:46:06 [服务器] ERROR java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:170)19.08 17:46:06 [服务器] ERROR java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead(SocketInputStream.java:116)19.08 17:46:06 [服务器] ERROR java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method)19.08 17:46:06 [服务器] ERROR Stack:19.08 17:46:06 [服务器] ERROR PID: 26 | Suspended: false | Native: true | State: RUNNABLE19.08 17:46:06 [服务器] ERROR Current Thread: Server thread19.08 17:46:06 [服务器] ERROR ------------------------------19.08 17:46:06 [服务器] ERROR Server thread dump (Look for plugins here before reporting to Spigot!):19.08 17:46:06 [服务器] ERROR ------------------------------19.08 17:46:06 [服务器] ERROR Spigot version: git-Spigot-db6de12-7911b3e (MC: 1.8.8)19.08 17:46:05 [服务器] ERROR Be sure to include ALL relevant console errors and Minecraft crash reports19.08 17:46:05 [服务器] ERROR Please report this to http://www.spigotmc.org/


已经蹦了，然后出现报错。
求解。

在蹦服前有个插件反应集群压测

报错不知道是什么。
经常蹦，求解。
